text: Proactiv is an American brand of skin-care products created by two American dermatologists, Katie Rodan and Kathy A. Fields. It was created in 1995 and was supported by many celebrities.Katie Rodan, Kathy Fields (2008). Unblemished, Simon and Schuster, pp. 4â€“8. They sell moisturizers, body washes and treatment products, but the brand is known for its three-step anti-acne products. ==References== Category:1995 establishments in the United States Category:Companies of the United States Category:Cosmetics companies
title: Proactiv
